casebody.data:
James A. BRADLEY, Employee
v.
CUMBERLAND COUNTY, Employer, Self-Insured (Key Risk Management Services, Inc., Servicing Agent) No. 438P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Stephen C. McIntyre, Attorney at Law, for Bradley, James A. Dayle A. Flammia, Lindsay A. Underwood, Attorneys at Law, for Cumberland County, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 14th of December 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
